title: Trump Campaign = Broke, Pray 4 Phil Collins 10.22.20
itunes:title: Trump Campaign = Broke, Pray 4 Phil Collins 10.22.20
description:
In episode 741, Jack and Miles are joined by Bald Talk hosts Brian Huskey and Charlie Sanders to discuss Daniel Cameron selling Breonna Taylor out to preserve police brutality, voter suppression, Phil Collins suing his ex-wife over an armed occupation and take over of his mansion, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Juror in Breonna Taylor case said grand jury didn't agree fatal shooting was justified
  2. 'We will come after you': Voters report personalized emails pressuring them to vote for Donald Trump
  3. Threatening emails reportedly sent to Democratic voters in three swing states, sparking investigations
  4. Phil Collins Is Now Suing His Ex-Wife Over “an Armed Occupation and Takeover” of His Mansion
  5. Phil Collins Responds To Rumors He Divorced His Wife Via Fax Machine
  6. Phil Collins Splits from Ex-Wife Orianne for a Second Time, Sends Eviction Notice: Reports
  7. Phil Collins wants to end ex wife’s ‘armed occupation’ of his mansion, lawsuit says
  8. Phil Collins suit
  9. WATCH: Go Go by Coop

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
